text: The amount of rage and anger that I feel reading about these pathetic motherfuckers cannot be put into words. These words do not exist nor can be created. The amount of pain I wish to inflict has no rating on any current scales that exist. The pain is infinite.

@sallybhunt and "too emotional". Can't be president because when it's that time of the month she'll be going to war with everyone. Basically, women are oppressed by stupid men that don't know a thing about women or their biology. Like how they shouldn't drive or ride bikes because it would fuck up their womb and ovaries. And no education because their brains can't handle it. So just because there are laws giving women rights and freedoms that doesn't mean that there isn't other bullshit out there that oppresses or harms women. Dudes just want to ignore all of that in order to tell women that there is nothing to complain about.
@hourintime We are often seen as stupid, crazy, overemotional, and “hysterical”.
@hourintime and discrimination, of course. I didn’t mention that. We are seen as stupid, are dismissed & invalidated, and often aren’t taken as seriously.

@hourintime People are willfully ignorant and oblivious. The violence, belittling, degradation, dehumanization, & harassment we face every day is very real. Just because the laws give us equal rights to a certain degree, that doesn’t mean our daily lives aren’t full of so many extra layers of bullshit thrown our way. It’s a constant struggle to break through these barriers. And we are raised to hate ourselves. The self-loathing is real, because of the messages sent to us daily all throughout the media and from other people all around us in society.
I keep getting asked how women are being oppressed in this day and age. They can vote, work, and go to school, so what is there to complain about? Women are basically being lynched.

Yup. We have great gun laws here in Hawaii. Can’t carry guns in public. But a handicapped man feels unsafe leaving his house and sued the State of Hawaii. We might have people carrying guns in public here in Hawaii in several years. Cause of this dumb ass mother fucker.
After reading that oooh I'm sick to my stomach.
Are ANY of these killers undocumented immigrants? Seems to me a wall is going to trap us inside our borders with our own homegrown terrorists. Ugh.
Is it just me or are a lot of people just getting desensitized to mass shootings? It's horrible.  I am not proud of this. My first thought was "Wow, Florida Man in the lead for January". 😔
